import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { BackEndServiceService } from 'src/app/back-end-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-viewproduct', templateUrl: './viewproduct.component.html', styleUrls: ['./viewproduct.component.scss'] }) export class ViewproductComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private backendservice:BackEndServiceService){} Dataarray: any[] = []; ngOnInit():void{ this.backendservice.getproductdata().subscribe((res)=>{ this.Dataarray=res; }) } }
